Featured App Verxid is a proprietary end to end highly secured, innovative touchless biometric infrastructure that can be integrated into existing mobile apps to enhance and offer multi-factor biometrics authentication. A patent self-service touchless biometric solution fitted on a smart mobile device that can integrate seamlessly as an "Authentication Call to Action" process. View More Verxid is a proprietary end to end highly secured, innovative touchless biometric infrastructure that can be integrated into existing mobile apps to enhance and offer multi-factor biometrics authentication. A patent self-service touchless biometric solution fitted on a smart mobile device that can integrate seamlessly as an "Authentication Call to Action" process.

Smart Revenue System Smart Revenue System (SRS) is an advanced enterprise revenue management solution, designed by our in-house developers for Organizations with the need to streamline their revenue collection and process management with cutting edge technology. Our SRS provides Core applications, giving your organization control over collection of revenues across all levels. Electronic Document Management System This system helps organizations to track, manage and store/ archive documents, while eradicating dependencies on paper. It is capable of keeping record of the various versions created and modified by different users based on access control. Biometric System Biometric System is an advanced Automated Biometric Identification System (ABIS) used for large-scale biometric identification and deduplication using fingerprint, face recognition. Payroll Management System Our Payroll management System handles all the processes and steps required to pay employee. Which includes keeping track of time worked, calculating wages, remitting benefits, withholding taxes and other deductions. At BTL, our dedicated ICT practice deploys best of industry professionals in Nigeria and abroad. Our team of experts have decades of experience in the development and deployment of high-end IT solutions tailored to specific needs. Our dedicated practices cut across all works of life providing solutions in many industry lines. Software Development, Implementation & Management We apply cutting-edge techniques to ensure that our software products are delivered efficiently, effectively, and to the satisfaction of our clients and stakeholders. Touchless Biometric System We provide advanced contactless/touchless Automated Biometric Identification System (ABIS) used for large-scale biometric identification and deduplication. Custom Software and Mobile Application Integration We specialize in app development and will help you choose the best approach for your business. Either a custom build to exactly suit your needs, or an integration project to connect your existing apps to other solution providers. Data Loss Prevention (DLP) Data can end up in the wrong hands without proper prevention in place, irrespective if it was through email or instant messaging, website forms, file transfers, or other means. We provide Data Loss Prevention strategies solutions through our well researched and development partnership company to monitor, detect, and block the unauthorized flow of information. Network and Deployment Services We provide a variety of flexible installation offerings, designed to assist you in planning and implementing your network solutions. Whether you are deploying a single site or multi-site, we have the expertise to deploy your network solutions, either for a greenfield application, redesigning networks, or deploying existing hardware in new applications or new locations. Training and Support Services We offer professional training and support services, which are led by IT experts with extensive work experience in research and advance software development. IT Advisory Service and Project Management Our project management service offer an objective, professional approach to managing the many risks associated with IT projects and programme implementation, and give constructive advice to this regard. IT Procurement Service We put in place a collection of processes that focus on identifying business and strategic needs for IT, selecting the appropriate solutions, and then executing the purchases themselves.
